trans-unit.resname: MIR·5 | Blinding Light | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.target: 横置所有非白色的生物。

trans-unit.resname: MIR·108 | Bone Harvest | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Put any number of target creature cards from your graveyard on top of your library.
trans-unit.target: 将任意数量的目标生物牌从你的坟墓场置于你的牌库顶。

trans-unit.resname: MIR·108 | Bone Harvest | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
trans-unit.target: 在下一个回合维持开始时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: MIR·101 | Vaporous Djinn | Card Text | Paragraph 1
MIR·122 | Feral Shadow | Card Text | Paragraph 1
